entries.title: Supreme Court allows WhatsApp lawsuit over 'Pegasus' spyware to move forward
entries.description: The Supreme Court allowed Meta to pursue a lawsuit alleging that an Israeli company unlawfully accessed WhatsApp servers when installing spyware on devices.

entries.title: Bernard Kalb, longtime foreign affairs newsman, dies at 100
entries.description: Bernard Kalb, a former reporter for CBS and NBC who quit his job as a State Department spokesman to protest a U.S. government disinformation has died at 100.
